definition: to be in a poor light/to do sth with one's back to the light/to stand in one's own light
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

sentences.english: Alerting the user by flashing the backlight, playing a sound, or vibrating.
sentences.chinese: 通过闪烁背光，播放声音，或者振动提示用户。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a negative phototropism module and its pervasion plate structure.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种背光模块及所使用的扩散板结构。

sentences.english: Late sun backlights mountains and fog in this dramatic scene.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳背光山和雾在这一戏剧性场面。

sentences.english: The backlit user interface only lights up as you approach the M100.
sentences.chinese: 背光式的使用者介面只随著你靠近M100而发亮。

sentences.english: This invention relates to a sort of back-light power.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种背光源。

sentences.english: Button with a blue backlight, very beautiful at night Kaideng can not use.
sentences.chinese: 按键带有蓝色背光，很漂亮，晚上不开灯也能使用。

sentences.english: I love to use the backlighting effect for the purity and dream like quality that it creates.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢使用背光效果创造出的纯净梦幻的效果。

sentences.english: Backlight will not light if only use the mouse function.
sentences.chinese: 只用鼠标功能时，背光灯不点亮。

sentences.english: Side-on radiography technology can directly demonstrate the change of perturbation amplitude on target surface.
sentences.chinese: 侧向背光照相能直接反映靶表面扰动幅度的变化情况。

sentences.english: This back-light photography of the white lotus flower was at the Botanical Garden in Erlangen.
sentences.chinese: 这种白莲花背光摄影是在埃尔兰根植物园。

sentences.english: The invention also discloses a backlight module using the light guide plate .
sentences.chinese: 本发明还公开了使用上述导光板的背光模组。

sentences.english: Sony Readers have touch screens; some models even have built-in illumination screens.
sentences.chinese: 索尼阅读器有触摸屏，一些型号还有内建的屏幕背光。

sentences.english: Automatic backlight, convenient for nighttime operation.
sentences.chinese: 自动背光，方便夜间操作。

sentences.english: It is also the only keyboard in its class that is backlit, if that's your bag.
sentences.chinese: 这是唯一一带有背光灯的键盘。

sentences.english: Scientists speculate there is water-ice in the planet's permanently shadowed craters
sentences.chinese: 科学家预测在常年背光的火山口处有刨冰存在。

sentences.english: There is no anamorphic stretch mode, and the remote has no backlighting.
sentences.chinese: 毫无变形拉伸模式，远程没有背光。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
